remarks: Swap the arguments of the trace of a composition with converse. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2013.)
statement:
trlcocnv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlcocnv.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcocnv.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcocnv $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) -> ( R ` ( F o. `' G ) ) = ( R ` ( G o. `' F ) ) ) $.
